==== Application Notes ====

Please add additional notes about this application review below:

This simple application allows you to turn your computer with the camera to the mirror. Have you ever found themselves in a situation where you had to be a mirror, but it was nowhere to take? Now, the mirror will always be at your fingertips - your computer will be a mirror!
